title: Shop ’til you drop: Facebook shows off shopping feed and new ads for brands
text:
Shop ’til you drop: Facebook shows off shopping feed and new ads for brands 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
Facebook wants you to shop with the brands you like right in its app. The social network developed tools for brands to make better ads, a sh...
